business.headline: Meta plans to lay off 'lowest performance' staff next week, internal memo revealsNotices will go out to employees losing their jobs starting at 5 am local time on Monday in most countries, including in the US, according to one of the posts, authored by Meta's Head of People Janelle Gale.

Cabinet clears new income tax bill, likely to be tabled in Lok Sabha Monday: SourcesThe new legislation, which is often referred to as the Direct Tax Code, is aimed at overhauling the existing tax structure, making it more streamlined and transparent.

5 things about Mohini Mohan Dutta: The man named in Ratan Tata's willWhile most anticipated that Ratan Tata's wealth would go towards philanthropy, family members, and other charitable causes, Mohini Mohan Dutta's mention in his will has surprised many.

Infosys clarifies 'forceful' layoffs: Freshers get 3 attempts to clear assessmentInfosys said freshers undergo foundational training at its Mysuru campus and must pass an internal assessment to continue working.
Infosys 'forcefully' lays off 700 trainees in Mysuru: ReportMost of the affected recruits were from the engineering batch of 2022, who were onboarded after a wait of about 2.25 years, said sources.

Sensex, Nifty end lower after volatile session; FMCG, energy drag marketThe S&P BSE Sensex fell by 197.97 points to end at 77,860.19, while the NSE Nifty50 declined by 43.40 points to close at 23,559.95.

Sensex tanks 500 points after RBI MPC: Why is stock market falling todayThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 539.72 points to 77,516.79, while the NSE Nifty50 declined by 147.50 points to 23,455.60 as of 2:43 PM.

Activate UAN to avail EPFO's ELI scheme benefits before February 15. Check detailsEPFO ELI: UAN or Universal Account Number is a unique 12-digit number allotted by EPFO which is necessary for managing provident fund accounts.

Who is Mohini Mohan Dutta? Rs 500 crore surprise in Ratan Tata's willRatan Tata also left behind a share for his siblings, his butler Subbiah and German Shepherd Tito have also been provided for in his will.

RBI introduces 'bank.in' domain for Indian banks to tackle financial fraudThe move aims to tackle growing financial fraud and cybercrime, prevent malicious activities, and strengthen the country's financial ecosystem.
RBI cuts key lending rate after 5 years: 6 takeaways from the announcementThe central bank has announced a reduction in the repo rate by 25 basis points for the first time in nearly five years.
After 5 years, RBI cut key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6.25%This marks the first rate cut since 2020 and the first policy decision under Governor Malhotra's leadership.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts rates. Check detailsThe RBI MPC reduced key lending rates by 25 basis points to 6.25%, the first rate cut in nearly five years under the leadership of newly appointed RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra.
RBI reduces key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6.25%The rate cut announced by the committee is the first since 2020. This was also the first policy meeting of Sanjay Malhotra as RBI Governor.
Stock markets open flat as investors await RBI policy decision; ITC down 2%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 23.98 points to 78,034.18, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 7 points to 23,596.35 as of 9:35 AM.
HDFC Bank UPI services unavailable on this date. Get details hereDuring the downtime, the UPI transactions on HDFC Bank's current and savings accounts and RuPay credit cards will be affected.

Zomato to be Eternal? Deepinder Goyal says company name change cleared by boardThe renaming announcement comes weeks after Zomato entered the BSE Sensex on December 23, which coincides with the 17th anniversary of its founding.

What if you default on personal loan? Check consequencesPersonal loan default consequences: Banks or lenders impose hefty penalties, or late fee charges in case of a missed EMI amount. They may even impose higher interest charges and additional charges for collection efforts.

Want to redeem credit card points? Check these 2 simple ways How to redeem credit card points: The number of credit card points one earns depends on the type of card, whether basic or premium, and the amount spent.

entertainment.headline: The Mehta Boys to Mrs: Top 6 OTT releases this weekThis weekend, a variety of highly anticipated South films and original titles are set to release on OTT platforms, offering viewers a diverse selection for binge-watching. Check out the list of the OTT releases of the week.

Lamar has recently been in the news for winning five Grammys for his diss track Not Like Us, directed at rapper Drake.

Maryade Prashne OTT release: When and where to watch the revenge dramaThe revenge family drama Maryade Prashne, which released in November last year, is now available to stream on a major OTT platform.

How Netflix pulled most unexpected casting coup with Khakee The Bengal ChapterNetflix has orchestrated a major casting coup by bringing together top stars of Bengali cinema for its upcoming crime thriller, Khakee: The Bengal Chapter. The show promises to showcase the industry's talent and diversity in a groundbreaking way.

Internet shreds Elvish Yadav for trolling Bigg Boss 18 finalist Chum DarangSocial media users have slammed YouTuber contestant Elvish Yadav for making inappropriate remarks about Bigg Boss 18 finalist and actor Chum Darang's name.

Bada Naam Karenge review: Sweet, familiar and full of sanskaarsReleased-Fri Feb 07, 2025Bada Naam Karenge is a classic Rajshri Productions love story with sweet romance, catchy music, and family drama. While it evokes nostalgia, its simple plot and dated gender roles may not resonate with all. Strong performances and a heartfelt message make it a warm, fulfilling watch.

From romance to revenge, K-drama star Park Hyung-sik can do it allThere are not many South Korean stars who can boast of having a diverse filmography like Park Hyung-sik. In today's installment of our Weekly K-Fix, we take a quick look at the artiste's short but illustrious career.

The Greatest Rivalry India vs Pakistan: Reliving cricket's golden era and its heroes  Released-Fri Feb 07, 2025The Greatest Rivalry India vs Pakistan review: A new Netflix docu-series revives the legendary India vs Pakistan cricket rivalry, exploring its intense history and iconic players with insights from cricket legends and journalists.

What makes Netflix's The Trauma Code a breakout hit surpassing Squid Game 2The Trauma Code: Heroes on Call has taken Netflix by storm, surpassing Squid Game Season 2 on the global chart. This medical drama captivates with its blend of intense medical scenarios, hospital politics, and humour, offering a fresh take on the genre.

Exclusive: Triptii Dimri begins prep for Parveen Babi biopic, yet to sign projectIndia Today Digital has exclusively learnt that Triptii Dimri has begun preparing for her role as Parveen Babi in a biopic, even before officially signing the project. The series, directed by Shonali Bose, is yet to be announced.
Kanye West on Bianca Censori's nude dress controversy: Wife is so brave and hotKanye West defends his wife Bianca Censori's controversial invisible dress at the Grammy 2025, sharing a long note on X.

Ram Kapoor on 55 kg weight loss: No Ozempic, just hard workRam Kapoor's 55 kg weight loss has sparked widespread speculation about the methods he used. However, Kapoor clarified on social media that his transformation was achieved through hard work and dedication, dismissing the use of shortcuts like Ozempic or surgery.

Kinda Pregnant review: Amy Schumer's comedy film barely deliversReleased-Wed Feb 05, 2025Amy Schumer returns with Kinda Pregnant, a comedy that struggles to hit the mark. Despite its premise of friendship and motherhood, it fails to offer fresh laughs or insights.

Justin Bieber, wife Hailey step out for a date amid divorce rumoursJustin and Hailey Bieber were seen enjoying a date night in New York City, countering recent divorce rumours. Despite reports of marital strain linked to Justin's legal anxieties, the couple appeared united.

Anuja review: Raw performances, hard-hitting subject make it a compelling watchReleased-Thu Feb 06, 2025Anuja movie review: Oscar-nominated Anuja is a gripping short film on child labour and resilience. With stellar performances and a hard-hitting narrative, it is a must-watch on Netflix.

The Night Agent Season 2 review: Equal parts dramatic and delectably excitingReleased-Thu Jan 23, 2025In The Night Agent Season 2 on Netflix, a spy recruited by the most secretive body of the FBI, gets entangled in the mysteries of state secrets and in-house traitors. Peter Sutherland is back to save his country from falling.

Kadhalikka Neramillai on OTT: When and where to watch Nithya Menen, Ravi Mohan filmNithya Menen and Ravi Mohan's Kadhalikka Neramillai is reportedly gearing up for its OTT debut on Netflix. The film was earlier released in theatres during the Pongal festival.

Mrs review: Sanya Malhotra's film is an unsettling watch, for all the right reasonsReleased-Thu Feb 06, 2025ZEE5 film 'Mrs', starring Sanya Malhotra, explores the harsh realities that several women face in marriage. A Hindi adaptation of 'The Great Indian Kitchen', Mrs delves into themes of patriarchy and unfulfilled aspirations.

Milind Deora's 'woke' dig at Grammys for not honouring tabla icon Zakir HussainShiv Sena leader and Member of Parliament Milind Deora took a dig at the Grammys for omitting Tabla maestro Zakir Hussain's name from their In Memoriam segment. Zakir Hussain, who died in December 2024, was a four-time Grammy winner.

Kendrick Lamar vs Drake: Did the Grammys settle the 'battle rap'?Rappers Kendrick Lamar and Drake's feud spans over a decade, with diss tracks, accusations, and a lawsuit. From collaborations to lyrical attacks, here's a full breakdown of their ongoing rap battle.

general news.headline: 'Kingmakers' middle class, Purvanchali voters shift to BJP, ditch AAPDelhi election results: Early trends show that the BJP is on its way to forming a government in the national capital after 27 years.

BJP headed for victory in prestige battle against Samajwadi Party in UP's Milkipur  Live UpdatesThe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) is set to wrest UP's Milkipur from Samajwadi Party in the battle of prestige.

BJP's 'we're coming to Delhi' poster after party set to end 27-year waitThe BJP, which appears on course to dislodge the AAP and end its 27-year wait in Delhi, put out a poster today that read, 'In Delhi, the BJP is coming' (Dilli mein BJP aa rahi hain).

Omar Abdullah trolls AAP-Congress over Delhi debacle: 'Aur lado aapas mein'Omar Abdullah has been vocal about his dissatisfaction with the internal dynamics of the INDIA bloc, criticising the lack of unity among its member parties.

Trump revokes Biden's security clearances: Joe, you're fired Donald Trump announced he is revoking Joe Biden's security clearance, ending his access to classified information and intelligence briefings. Trump declared the decision on Truth Social, stating, "Joe, you're fired."

Patparganj Live: AAP's Avadh Ojha concedes as BJP's Ravinder Negi set to winPatparganj Assembly Election Result 2025 Live: BJP's Ravinder Singh Negi, who lost to AAP leader Manish Sisodia from Patparganj in a close contest in 2020, looks on course for a major victory over AAP candidate Avadh Ojha, a UPSC educator. Former Delhi Deputy Chief Minister Manish Sisodia held the seat for a brief period in 2013, and again since 2015, before switching to Jangpura. Negi is set to end AAP's 10-year-old domination in the east Delhi seat, which has a sizeable population of Poorvanchalis. Follow indiatoday.in for live updates.

DMK eyes easy win in Erode (East) Assembly seat by-election Live UpdatesWith Naam Tamilar Katchi (NTK) being the only party as an opponent, the ruling Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (DMK) had a huge lead of more than 30,000 votes in the Erode (East) Tamil Nadu Assembly seat by-election.

Greater Kailash upset? AAP's Saurabh Bharadwaj trails BJP's Shikha Roy Live UpdatesWith only four rounds of counting to go, Delhi minister Saurabh Bharadwaj, who was leading by a healthy margin of over 3,000 votes in the first round, is now trailing by nearly 2,000 votes.

Bryan Johnson shares Taare Zameen Par meme with AQI reference for IndiansAnti-ageing enthusiast Bryan Johnson advised Indians to prioritise "cleaning the air rather than curing cancer" as he addressed the debate that ensued online after he walked out of Nikhil Kamath's podcast due to air quality concerns.

No seat for Congress in Delhi? Election Commission trends show 0 leadsThe trends showed the BJP leading in 43 seats and the AAP in 27, while there was no sign of the Congress. The Delhi Assembly has 70 seats.

Congress's Alka Lamba is placed third with 2,571 votes. After trailing since the morning, Atishi took the lead briefly before falling behind again.

FIFA bans Pakistan from international events after constitution revision failureFIFA has banned Pakistan Football Federation (PFF) from taking part in international competitions due to its failure to adopt a revision of its constitution. The FIFA also banned Congo Republic's football association (FECOFOOT) due to intereference from third parties in its internal affairs.

BCCI goes NBA, NFL way with 'Champions' ring for India's T20 WC 2024 winnersThe BCCI decided to take inspiration from the NBA and the NFL as they presented India's T20 World Cup 2024 winning squad with 'Champions' rings during the Naman awards. Each player got the special ring during the event on February 1.

SL vs AUS: Smith and Carey's hundreds rescue Australia on Day 2 after early troubleAustralia finished Day 2 of the second Test against Sri Lanka in a commanding position as they finished the day on 330/3 leading Sri Lanka by 73 runs in the first innings. education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.
